Class Labirynth

  • java.lang.Object
    • Labirynth

  • class Labirynth
extends java.lang.Object
    Labirynth class. Defines game field(maze). And functions for creating said maze.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Cell[][] maze
      Actual labyrinth
      (package private) int size
      Size of labyrinth

      Creates exit event inside labyrinth

      Maze generator creates very simple labyrinth, that can be solved just by sticking to one side.
      (package private) int[] random_array()

    • Method Detail

      • build_maze

        void build_maze(int x,
                int y,
                int n,
                int p)
        Function that recursively build labyrinth.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of maze that we are currently building
        y - y coordinate of maze that we are currently building
        n - size of labyrinth
        p - side from which generator came to current cell while generating labyrinth, -1 when generator just started

      • create_events

        void create_events(int n,
                   Database data)
        Creates random events inside labyrinth. (To Do: create diffrent types of events beside discovering items)
        Parameters:
        n - labyrinth size
        data - Database object

      • create_exit

        void create_exit(int n,
                 Database data)
        Creates exit event inside labyrinth
        Parameters:
        n - labyrinth size
        data - Database object

      • extra_paths

        void extra_paths(int n)
        Maze generator creates very simple labyrinth, that can be solved just by sticking to one side. Also it's not generating enough intersection. This function fixes that, by adding extra patch "breakes wall" between 2 paths)
        Parameters:
        n - size

      • random_array

        int[] random_array()
        Used by labyrinth builder. Randomizes direction of generating new cells
